title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5321.13 - Electronic table games internal control requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5321.13 - Electronic table games internal control requirements

State Regulations

In addition to the requirements set forth in section
5313.1
of this Subchapter, a gaming
facility licensee using an electronic table game system shall include in its
system of internal controls: (a) procedures to ensure the physical security of the computer or server and
related hardware, software and other devices; (b) procedures to ensure the integrity and
security of all sensitive data and software; (c) procedures to ensure that access to
sensitive data and software is limited to appropriate personnel only; and
(d) procedures to ensure the
logging of the events and the availability of records to permit an effective
audit of the conduct of the system and the reporting of revenue. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5321.13

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
